amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds to finalize, implement, administer, or enforce the Securities and Exchange Commission's Pay Ratio Disclosure rules.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A029) Agreed to by recorded vote: 236 - 185 (Roll no. 385).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
